PARAMETER SPACE

A clean interface for IFC model visualization

Capabilities

Import IFC

Load IFC files directly from your device. All processing happens locally in your browser — no data is uploaded to external servers.

Fragment Export

Optimize performance by exporting models into reusable fragments, enabling faster subsequent load times.

Element Selection

Select, isolate, and inspect specific model elements with high precision.

Properties View

Review detailed element properties in a structured tree view for in-depth analysis.
